Her form should be semi-transparent, partially dissolving into the environment, composed of geometric shapes and bold blocks of color rather than strictly anatomical accuracy.  The ‘tech gray’ isn’t a dull gray, but a range of metallic, cold grays with subtle glowing elements, suggesting partially submerged, futuristic remnants. “Swamp light” implies diffused, sub-surface scattering of light, creating a luminous haze. 

The aura circles are key – think thin, pastel coral rings radiating outwards, suggesting mystical energy. The image should feel both futuristic and ancient, organic and artificial.
